Well, you could say "I told you so", there's some stuff you don't 
know. I had originally started gunning for a restart 6-7 months ago, 
I just never voiced the opinion in a poll, or explained why I wanted 
a restart. Zardus convinced me that a restart wasn't necessary 
before, perhaps he was correct, but it's a little different this 
time.

Dewboy: Ok, stop spamming your idea to us about how to end the NBW. 
=P We understand what you want to do, and we'll... think about it... 
yes... think about it.

RID/BM = pathetic attempts at transformers. G1 all the way! =)

Jonathan: You had better help/be in charge of role-playing 101. 
Especially when you just start you don't want your characters to 
die. I don't think that any of my characters have really been in a 
situation where either mine or Jer's(rdahl) bots could grab them. I 
did end up having a few bots half slagged in battle, and Lynxiz has 
a nasty scar where one of Soulstice's characters put a spear gun 
through her back. (she would have died, but other people on that 
faction took her back to base)

Sometimes fights that should end quickly, don't and I kinda find it 
irritating. Example: the Perceptor/Firestrike fight. Firestrike has 
all the advantage. I kinda wanted it quickly, but Perceptor became 
psychic, shot the control panel (through Switchblade I might add), 
and knew every move that both Firestrike and Switchblade were going 
to do. (sorry airly, but sometimes your fights are a little far 
fetched)

Role-playing 101 will likely be the best thing that could happen to 
the rpg. We'll try it, but we'll need a plan...

About car transformers in the rpg. Jer and I brought in the 
Stunticons and Menasor when we joined. We had some fun causing some 
chaos. We even tried to get get to the Ark on the moon, but RyoD's 
characters somehow "knew" that we were going there, and decided to 
leave in a spaceship that was convieniently faster than ours. He had 
also (apparently) planted several million space mines to take out 
intruders heading for the Ark. Jer and I were both going "Ummm, wtf 
kinda BW rpg doesn't have the Ark as part of the conflict"

LN: When you came into the rpg, your bots, and everything about them 
was far too powerful. You seemed to have everything planned out so 
that your characters couldn't be killed, couldn't ever come into 
conflict where the couldn't win, couldn't be affected by anything 
unless you wanted them to. I don't know about anyone else, but that 
conpletely turned me off from wanting to RP with your characters, no 
matter how good an RPer you were. 

If we had screwed the naysayers, we'd have restarted 6 months ago 
when i wanted to originally...

Well, if we intend to have a sequel (ie restart with another name) 
then OOC posts are going to be too much of a problem. However, we DO 
have a messageboard on the website that all people can log in and 
use. Perhaps we should continues this discussion on on the 
messageboard. =)

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> Sequels would be  good. And if we did have one I would come back 
ass then 
> there could be a new story. Of course, you would have to end this 
one first 
> some how. Yes.... and apparrently Apocalyptic mails are 
unfavorable. But you 
> know, you and Hugar are the council members. you control the fate 
of the RPG. 
> YOu shouldnt be concerned with how the people are acting, I've 
noticed a 
> genral decline of posters that were here before, where have 
Gunthers and 
> Rudra gone? Heh, I told you before the RPG was becoming way over 
done but 
> noone listened. And now you seem to realize it so now I feel I can 
say... I 
> told you so.
